definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: He has to do lone heroes to save his beloved woman.
sentences.chinese: 他要做孤胆英雄去拯救自己心爱的女人。

sentences.english: In comparison, the Monkey King is a lone ranger.
sentences.chinese: 相比较而言，孙悟空是一个孤胆英雄。

sentences.english: The desperado cowboy has caught all of the bank robbers.
sentences.chinese: 那个孤胆英雄式的牛仔抓住了抢劫银行的所有歹徒。

sentences.english: I finished watching DIRECT CONTACT first this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我看完了《孤胆拯救》。

definition: lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
fighting everywhere over a thousand miles (idiom); constant fighting across the country/never-ending struggle
to charge and break through enemy lines
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
to roam far and wide/to drift with the wind
from the cradle to the grave (idiom); to go through fire and water/brave/willing to risk life and limb
